resources.string: No more moves are available. Start a new game or dismiss the dialog and use undo to continue playing.
An inconsistency in the data base was detected. Start a new game or dismiss and debug. See the Logcat for details

plurals.name: game_won
plurals.item: Congratulations! You won the game and only cheated once.
Congratulations! You won the game and cheated %1$d times.

resources.string: You can undo turning over a card that was face down.
Show highlights for the card above (red) and below (green) the selected card.
Cheat by flipping the top face down card in any stack.
Cheat by moving a card to the middle of a stack. Kings are moved before the corresponding queen.
Cards in the kitty are flipped in place.
Three columns have face down cards in them.
The king moves alone to empty columns.
Pass through the deck two times.
Win when you clear the cards in the pyramid.
Play two cards if the lower card is the only one covering the upper card.
